full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 205 of 228 881 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct 1 THE COURT: Okay. 2 MS. COMEY: And I'll show it to counsel first. 3 THE COURT: Thank you. 4 Q. Mr. Alessi, I've just handed you what is marked for identification as Government Exhibit 2. Would you take a look at that and tell us if you recognize it? 5 6 A. Yes, I do. 7 Q. What do you recognize it to be? 8 A. This was the booklet that it was -- that would take messages on it. These are the carbon copies. 9 10 Q. Okay. Do you recognize any of the handwriting in those books? 11 A. Yes. 12 Q. Could you just -- without reading the content of any messages, just tell us whose handwriting you recognize? 13 A. The first one, the second one, the fourth one in the first page are mine. 14 15 Q. On the first page, three of the messages are in your handwriting? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. Let's go to the second page please. 18 A. The second page, I recognize the first one as being my wife. The second one is mine, the third one is mine, the four one is mine. 19 20 In the -- in the next page, for some reason this 21 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012490
